name: Healthyfied Chopseuy
description: Indulge in the goodness of a 'Healthyfied Chopseuy', a perfect blend of fresh vegetables and lean ground beef, making it a low-carb and low-sugar delight. This recipe caters to those seeking to maintain a healthy lifestyle without compromising on flavor. Packed with nutrients and designed for healthy eating, this chopseuy is not just a meal; it's a step towards a healthier you.
recipeIngredient: 1  tbsp (18 g), Panda Brand Oyster Sauce

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Cauliflower, Carrots, Chinese Cabbage (Pak-Choi), Red Onion, Red Bell Pepper, Broccoli, Young Corn under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the cauliflower, carrots, broccoli, and young corn into bite-sized pieces. Slice the Chinese cabbage, red onion, and red bell pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned, about 5-7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the minced garlic to the beef and cook for another 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the white beech mushrooms, cauliflower, carrots, broccoli, and young corn, cooking for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced pak-choi, red onion, and red bell pepper to the pan, cooking for another 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Season the chopseuy with coconut amino, black pepper, and oyster sauce. Stir well and cook for an additional 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
